column17:
REEBOK CLASSIC MENS SHIRT - SIZE - L - 42:
Complete your formal looks with this Classic off-white full sleeve Mens shirt from Reebok. This shirt is made of soft fabric which is comfortable to wear all day long. The colour of this full sleeve shirt adds to its formal look and is a prefect wear for summers. It has a front pocket to provide convenience of carrying the essentials. Team up this shirt from Reebok with a black-coloured formal trouser.
